title: Martins.DYOR
author: Martins.DYOR
created_time: June 29, 2023, 08:17:25 AMLast edit: June 29, 2023, 05:08:35 PM by Martins.DYOR
content: Dyor is taking its overall Reward Pool to new heights $333,333!The new campaign is starting now!Join Dyor's Wallet Wars Now!Get ready for an exciting competition where 6 wallets compete for victory. You have the chance to be one of 3 lucky voters!To win rewards:Vote for your favorite wallet.Enter Dyor's waitlist.Get a chance to win $450 - 5,000 Dyor tokens!The giveaway starts today! Follow dyor on Twitter for updates and information -> twitter.com/dyorexchangeJoin Wallet Wars now!More Giveaways are on the way!Join the waitlist - dyor.exchange

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: Martins.DYOR on June 29, 2023, 08:17:25 AMDyor is taking its overall Reward Pool to new heights $333,333!The new campaign is starting now!Join Dyor's Wallet Wars Now!Get ready for an exciting competition where 6 wallets compete for victory. You have the chance to be one of 3 lucky voters!To win rewards:Vote for your favorite wallet.Enter Dyor's waitlist.Get a chance to win $450 - 5,000 Dyor tokens!The giveaway starts today! Follow dyor on Twitter for updates. -> twitter.com/dyorexchangeJoin Wallet Wars now!More Giveaways are on the way!Join the waitlist - dyor.exchangeThis is more on referral bonus, right? If we don't share our referral link we won't be able to receive any tokens, isn't we?And I noticed that the swap of the DYOR will be held in next year's first quarter 2024. It's still quite a while before the token can really be used, about 9 or 10 months from now and then it's not sure if its value will increase. There is still a risk, anyway, it's just giveaways, who knows the value will suddenly increase, like what happened to XLM before when it started.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Hmm, I think you should add the requirements here as well, also the eligibility criteria should also be mentioned here as well such as county restrictions and other things related to giveaways. Also, I am a bit confused with the rewards is it in USD or the USD equivalent valued DYOR tokens? If it's in the token how the price is gonna taken into count I have just checked the DYOR token on the blog it's coming soon so there is no public information related to the token.Please clarify..

comments.author: Martins.DYOR
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on June 29, 2023, 12:02:11 PMQuote from: Martins.DYOR on June 29, 2023, 08:17:25 AMDyor is taking its overall Reward Pool to new heights $333,333!The new campaign is starting now!Join Dyor's Wallet Wars Now!Get ready for an exciting competition where 6 wallets compete for victory. You have the chance to be one of 3 lucky voters!To win rewards:Vote for your favorite wallet.Enter Dyor's waitlist.Get a chance to win $450 - 5,000 Dyor tokens!The giveaway starts today! Follow dyor on Twitter for updates. -> twitter.com/dyorexchangeJoin Wallet Wars now!More Giveaways are on the way!Join the waitlist - dyor.exchangeThis is more on referral bonus, right? If we don't share our referral link we won't be able to receive any tokens, isn't we?And I noticed that the swap of the DYOR will be held in next year's first quarter 2024. It's still quite a while before the token can really be used, about 9 or 10 months from now and then it's not sure if its value will increase. There is still a risk, anyway, it's just giveaways, who knows the value will suddenly increase, like what happened to XLM before when it started.Hi @gunhell16,Appreciate your questionEvery person receives 10 Dyor Tokens upon signing up for the waiting list. Furthermore, it is possible to move up the waiting list through referrals, automatically unlocking more rewards as your move up the ranks. Regarding token launch, we will be launching in Q1 2024 - enabling conversion of the earned points into Dyor tokens.In this particular giveaway that is hosted on Twitter, we will be selecting random 3 users, who have qualified for an entry, to distribute the prize. Please let me know if you have any additional questions.Cheers,Martins

comments.author: Martins.DYOR
comments.body: Quote from: Hamza2424 on June 29, 2023, 05:07:35 PMHmm, I think you should add the requirements here as well, also the eligibility criteria should also be mentioned here as well such as county restrictions and other things related to giveaways. Also, I am a bit confused with the rewards is it in USD or the USD equivalent valued DYOR tokens? If it's in the token how the price is gonna taken into count I have just checked the DYOR token on the blog it's coming soon so there is no public information related to the token.Please clarify..Hey @Hamza2424,Appreciate your question!The T&Cs for waiting list, giveaways & rewards can be found on our website.Regarding this giveaway, the prize will be distributed to 3 randomly-selected, qualified entrants in USD denominated stablecoins.Let me know if there is anything else I can help with.Kind regards,Martins
